Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,000,000 to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, hoping to make this opportunity even more attractive for you. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of prompt delivery and unparalleled customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
